info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...CLUSTER OF THUNDERSTORMS NEAR LAKEVIEW MONTANA MOVING EAST- SOUTHEAST TOWARD HENRYS LAKE AND ISLAND PARK RESERVOIR THROUGH 545 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms extending from 12 miles west of Henrys Lake to 10 miles north of Kilgore, moving east-southeast at 15 mph toward Henrys Lake and Island Park Reservoir. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph along with occasional lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds and lightning could cause hazardous boating conditions. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Sheridan Reservoir and Targhee Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Henrys Lake or Island Park Reservoir, now would be a good time to head for shore and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
